entry.message: [info] Activation of plug-in DQC Rules Validator successful, version Check version using Tools->DQC->Version on the GUI or --dqc-version on the command line. - validate/DQC
[info] Activation of plug-in SEC Inline Transforms successful, version 19.2. - transforms/SEC

[DQC.IFRS.0102.9544] Increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents before effect of exchange rate changes with a value of -3,000,000 is not equal to the combined total of Cash flows from (used in) operating activities, Cash flows from (used in) investing activities and Cash flows from (used in) financing activities ( 4,130,000,000 + 16,074,000,000 + -15,578,000,000 ) with a value of 4,626,000,000.
These values should be equal.
